overview: Mr. Schiesz is Chief Technology Officer of FameCast. Prior to joining FameCast, Mr. Schiesz was an early pioneer of web-based technologies and worked on several internet start-ups in the late 1990â€™s, including INO Global Markets and Blackboard, Inc. Mr. Schiesz brings more than 17 years of experience with web-based system architecture and internet technologies that was developed from a childhood passion for technology. In addition, Mr. Schiesz grew up as a D.J. in the underground music scenes of Washington D.C., Philadelphia, and New York City at clubs such as Limelight, Fever, Twilo, Capital Ballroom, and Buzz. In 2000, Mr. Schiesz launched TIPS Technology, focused on delivering web-based applications. Since then, Mr. Schiesz has launched three separate businesses and currently serves as a Director for Austin Software Architects, an Austin-based software development company and think tank.
